what: Shiny App of The Famous 151 First Pokemons
title: Shiny App of The Famous 151 First Pokemons
text: shiny app pokemons

title: Shiny App of The Famous 151 First Pokemons
text: app designed two reasons: propose something original upcoming shiny contest event serve gallery RinteRface tablerDash dashboard template

title: Shiny App of The Famous 151 First Pokemons
text: original data taken amazing pokeApi. built data found relevant API (see data-waw folder). Moreover, chose deal first 151 pokemons (played child). restriction actually straightforward seems handle, since element need belong first pokemon generation (API provides unfiltered data). features exist now first games (namely red/blue): eggs special objects day/night cycle mega evolutions …

title: Shiny App of The Famous 151 First Pokemons
text: app packaged 11 shiny modules tightly interact together pass useful informations, currently selected pokemon. outputs mainly generated excellents echarts4r visNetwork.

title: Shiny App of The Famous 151 First Pokemons
text: app built top Bootstrap 4 tablerDash template. Furthermore, includes pushbar.js library implementation John Coene. Combined together, allows develop clean templates, especially mobile devices.

title: Shiny App of The Famous 151 First Pokemons
text: Develop fight system based pokemon’s stats
